title: SupportNet Helpdesk Intern
description: Assisted the IT department in providing end-user support and maintaining reliable systems for local school districts.
details: Supported day-to-day IT operations for a multi-site organization, handling software installs, hardware provisioning, and workstation migrations.
Acted as first responder for security and access incidents, escalating and documenting issues per policy.
Assisted with a large-scale email service migration, minimizing downtime for staff and ensuring data continuity.
